Popular Games
Free Serving Games Goodgame Cafe Open up your own Cafe and amaze your customers with your cooking skills in this exciting time management online game. Become a kitchen chef, decide whats on the menu today and shop for tasty ingredients. Hire your friends, chat with them and visit their C
Rosie's Restaurant Rosie opened a new restaurant and she hopes this business will make her reach. But serving so many customers and keep them all happy and satisfied by her services is not such an easy job. That's why she needs someone to help her keep the restaurant going
Burger Restaurant 4 When a customer orders, fill the order by clicking each ingredient in the specified order. When the customer has been served, click the money left. Between levels, use your money to purchase upgrades
Burger Restaurant 2 Return to Burger Restaurant! Go global, this time with 3 new restaurants, new clients, and new meals!
Family Restaurant Create your own delicious dishes in the kitchen and make sure your guests get their orders on time.
In the later levels you can make your own ice cream recipes in the ice cream editor mode.
Manual: - Use your mouse to play the game. - Click on the
Burger Restaurant Make milkshakes, hamburgers, French fries and get your restaurant to the top! There are 3 different restaurants: Normal, in the park, Future.
Prepare the orders by clicking with the left mouse button on the machines and ingredients.
Tips: 1. Made
Sushi no suki Do you like sushi? try to make one? this one on a sushi go round table restaurant, there will be noodle ramen and sake also Be a sushi master, complete all 8 levels
Happy Playing :)
Burger Island As Patty Melton, the new owner of the tropical island-based Beach Burger restaurant, you must grill burgers, cook fries, and blend milkshakes all to order to earn money to spread your franchise all the way to the capital city of Honochuchu. Buy new recipe
Pizza Pronto Help the pizza pronto chef to create the best pizza delivery ever known! Serve your customers with a big smile and ofcourse on time! Buy upgrades for your restaurant and reach the daily goals!
Caesar Pizza You are pizza chef that open new pizzaria, complete all 20 level and win all the pizza tournament to become the best pizzaria in the country
Fresh Burger A skill game with a sense of humor! You have to serve as much customers possible within a given time limit.
Cash in lots of Highscore points, but beware to lose a life, would be a pity if you lose all your highscore points. Make yourself the Burgerking More Free Serving Games» Members Username: Password:
